name: Retro Mini Golf Master
description:
Retro Mini Golf Master is most realistic & addictive 3D game to play for Miniature Golf sports lovers. Retro Mini Golf Master has perfectly tuned physics of golf ball so that you can enjoy ultimate experience of golfing. Retro Mini Golf Master has very cool playing environments and graphics. Retro Mini Golf Master has very realistic and smooth touch control. It has up to 100 different challenging game levels. Each level has different Par values. Retro Mini Golf Master has awesome features and game play that surely you will love and recommend this game to your friends.

Game Features:
- User friendly control. Power Bar to control the speed of ball throw & controlled by touching hit button.
- Can change the direction of ball shot by swiping Left / Right on SCREEN
- Can ZOOM IN/ZOOM OUT by swipe up or down
- Nice background music.
- Excellent Graphics & Environment.
Game Modes:
"Retro Mini Golf Master" constituent of 3 stages, based on its difficulty levels and playing environments.
Stage One: Space Orchard
Space Orchard is consists of 20 different mini golf levels in cool environment of space.
Stage Two: Down Town
Down Town is consists of 20 different levels in City Park View.
Stage Three: Beach
Beach is consists of 20 different mini golf levels in beach view environment.
Stage Four: Snow Valley
Snow Valley is consists of 20 different mini golf levels in snow valley environment.
Stage Five: Cartoon Land
Cartoon Land is consists of 20 different mini golf levels in cartoonist view environment.

How to Play:
Swipe on screen to adjust direction of golf ball (left or right). Tap on HIT button to set force on ball and tap Hit button again to release the ball. Pot the ball with in Par limits to complete levels. If you failed to pot ball with in Par limit, it will result in level failed.

Play and let your friends and family play this game and challenge your friend with your highest score.
